item.title: The Beauty of Building With Mud, Trash, and Other Sustainable Materials
item.description: The construction industry accounts for 30-40% of the world’s total energy use and carbon emissions. Architect Vinu Daniel argues we can build more sustainably by using local, natural materials like mud and incorporating waste materials into construction. Tools and Techniques Mud bricks - Compressed mud bricks with 5% cement can be stronger than fired bricks.
